_description: This file contains initial birth data that simulates what a user would enter in the application. For integration testing, the test will read this data and use it as the starting point for the entire sequence flow.
_instructions: Only modify the values below. Keep the structure intact for testing purposes.

_field_descriptions.birthDate: YYYY-MM-DD format. This is the date of birth to be used for chart calculation.
_field_descriptions.birthTime: HH:MM:SS format in 24-hour notation. This is the birth time that will be rectified.
_field_descriptions.birthPlace: City, State/Province, Country format. Will be geocoded to get coordinates.

_optional_description: The fields below are optional. If provided, they will be used directly. If not provided, the application will calculate them through geocoding services.
